home.title: What will you create today?
home.subtitle: Select a tag below and let AI generate creative ideas for you. Click on different tags to explore endless possibilities.
home.selectTag: Select a tag to get started
home.clickTagDescription: Click on any tag above to generate a creative idea
home.refreshDescription: Click refresh for a new idea or try another tag

auth.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.signupDescription: Fill in the details below to create your account
auth.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long

ideas.findInSaved: You can find this in your saved ideas
ideas.removedFromCollection: The idea has been removed from your collection
ideas.shareTitle: Check out this idea from GiveMeWhat
ideas.clipboardDescription: The idea has been copied to your clipboard
